com.echopen.asso.echopen.model.Painter

Class SelfPaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.Paint
      • com.echopen.asso.echopen.model.Painter.SelfPaint

  • public class SelfPaint
extends android.graphics.Paint
    Created by mehdibenchoufi on 28/06/16. A class aiming to make work together Paint and TexPaint instances Implementing self-returning methods in order to fold the code ;)
